name: Head
template:
<meta charset="UTF-8">
    <link rel="icon" href="/img/favicon.ico?v=4" type="image/x-icon"/>
    <title>{{payload.title}}</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/css/bootstrap.css"/>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/jquery/jquery-ui.css"/>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/jquery/jquery-ui-timepicker-addon.css"/>

    <script src="/jquery/jquery-ui-timepicker-addon.js"></script>
    <script src="/scripts/plotly-latest.min.js"></script>

name: Publish Stop Seq
func:
var toppy = global.get('project') + '/' + global.get('deviceTypeA') + '/' + global.get('deviceNameA') + '/stopSeq';
return {topic:toppy,payload:true};

name: Get SSID
func:
var ssid = msg.payload.substring(msg.payload.indexOf("ESSID") + 6).split('\n')[0];
return {topic:msg.topic, payload:{topic:msg.topic ,payload:ssid, userID: msg.userID }};
